Work for Women 

     There is a wide field of service for women as well as for men. The efficient cook, the seamstress, the nurse --the help of all is needed. Let the members of poor 
                                                                           37
households be taught how to cook, how to make and mend their own clothing, how to nurse the sick, how to care properly for the home. Even the children should be taught to do some little errand of love and mercy for those less fortunate than themselves.
